title: Remarkable high-temperature ionic thermoelectric performance induced by graphene in gel thermocells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1559-1569
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03818A, Paper
Cheng-Gong Han, Yong-Bin Zhu, Lijuan Yang, Jiawei Chen, Shengjie Liu, Haoyu Wang, Yingming Ma, Dongxue Han, Li Niu
Graphene forms a structure like a “bridge” to link adjacent free water clusters in gels, accelerating ion diffusion and improving ionic thermoelectric performance.
